Taco Dip

time
15 minutes
serves
12
posted
21May2012
under
recipe
misc
permalink
comments?

Ingredients

  • 1 package Taco Seasoning
  • 8 oz. sour cream
  • 4 oz. salsa
  • 4 oz. taco sauce
  • 4 oz. cream cheese (softened)

Instructions

  • combine. spread. top with shredded lettuce, cheese, olives, etc.
